Comment: The suppression of the arts is another big sign of rising authoritarianism.  Artists capture truths/feelings and release it through their work.  Music, spoken and written word, dance, drama, artwork,etc....all expressions of what humans feel that must be suppressed by regimes.
Author: CouchCorrespondent
